short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your experience of intranet projects/tasks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:

- Initial Files: provides you with a command that create all the files and directories trees that you need for your projects, Simply copy and paste the command into your terminal.

- Tasks Navigation: Scroll to your desired task with ease using the keyboard mapping 
feature, which maps task numbers to the number keys on your keyboard.

- Checker Control: Launch all checks at once or select specific checks with the checker control. Also get feedback on which tasks have failed or succeeded.

- Easy Quiz: You don't have any more keep scroll down and up to correct you answers, allows you to easily review and change your responses

- Collapse Tasks: allows to collapse individual tasks or all successful/failed tasks at once

- User Style: fully customize the styling of your intranet page

More info:
Tutorial: https://youtu.be/6FhrEXUd1m4
README: https://github.com/amasin76/intranet-chrome-extension#readme
